alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 4:42PM EDT until June 29 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Harrison County in south central Indiana... Southeastern Meade County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Hancock County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Grayson County in central Kentucky... Hardin County in central Kentucky... Breckinridge County in central Kentucky... Northern Ohio County in central Kentucky... * Until 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/. * At 442 PM EDT/342 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Valley Station to near Hardinsburg to near Whitesville, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Leitchfield, Brandenburg, Hardinsburg, Radcliff, Webster, Vine Grove, Lebanon Junction, Irvington and Muldraugh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
